overview: A demon set loose from a hellish realm terrorizes a group of seniors in a small town high school. Based on a true story, director Tony Voccola delivers a horrifying depiction of the ABC murders that took place in his senior year. Starring Anthony Carlucci, Nicole Finlay, Levan Segura, Nicole Mattioli-Cortigiano and Cody Minutolo-Noble.
tagline: THEY WILL RUN, BUT NOT HIDE.
title: LUCCIFIED
